title: You are You

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- You are able to use any ability with the words "You are" in the ability. You are not able to repeat abilities
- You are able to deal a Powerful attack to a player at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are able to use any attributes needed for your ability to work.
- You are able to know who visits you at night.
- __**You are Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

desc:
Post 5088
*You are You, and others are not You*
